thread.title: Woman charged with rape of 4-year-old
thread.title_full: Woman charged with rape of 4-year-old - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Woman charged with rape of 4-year-old
text:
CINCINNATI â€” A 20-year-old woman has been charged with raping her 4-year-old son, police said.
India Kirksey, of West Price Hill, was arrested Monday, court documents show.
Investigators said she recorded herself performing a sex act on the 4-year-old. A family member in Texas saw the video and contacted Cincinnati-area authorities, prosecutors said.
Prosecutors also said Kirksey admitted to the incident.
She is being held in the Hamilton County Jail. Her bond was set at $350,000 Monday morning.
Story originally appeared on wlwt.com.
